thumb.title: [東方錦上京 〜 Fossilized Wonders] 聖なる聖域の異常【东方风自作曲】
thumb.description: -------------------------------------------------------------------------[Warning: This is a Fake OST]-------------------------------------------------------------------------Hello everyone!A few days ago, ZUN made an announcement about the release of Touhou 20, and it gave me just the right motivation to create this small composition, meant to feel like a menu theme.I tried to give it a sense of serenity with a touch of intensity.The structure is simple—just two sections—but I decided to play around with some instruments to add a bit of atmosphere.And of course, I couldn’t resist adding the Erhu. For some reason, I just had to use it.I’m really excited about the upcoming Touhou release, so I’ll be keeping an eye out to see if I can find time to transcribe some of the DEMO tracks once it’s out.Anyway, I hope you enjoy it![Particles: https://vizzy.io]-------------------------------------------------------------------------🎺 Original composer: Karl Zuñiga[This video is a derivative work of 東方Project].-------------------------------------------------------------------------
